papers.title: Research on WebGIS Application Based on Edge Computing
papers.abstract: The explosive growth of geospatial data makes the application services based on WebGIS face the challenges of computing intensive and concurrency intensive. This paper proposes to apply the edge cloud computing platform to WebGIS services to solve the problems of insufficient bandwidth and computing delay in GIS applications. In this paper, KubeEdge platform is used as the basic architecture support, and it is oriented to WebGIS based oilfield production management system to realize the edge computing of convective spatial big data and relieve the intensive computing pressure of underlying data in GIS system.

papers.title: Application of multidimensional data visualization technology and WebGIS in lightweight visualization system design
papers.abstract: With the rapid development of 5G Internet of things technology, the traditional WebGIS visualization technology can not meet the needs of Oilfield Engineering for the integration and visualization of various sensor monitoring data. This paper uses the most advanced ecarts open source data visualization technology, combined with the basic architecture of WebGIS, to realize the multi-dimensional and comprehensive visualization of all kinds of sensor data with temporal and spatial characteristics, and improve the ability of integration and analysis of multi-source data.
